description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Test your skill and learn to master the brain-racking world of spikes and sawblades in 50 levels of pure splatmania, including 10 additional hardcore “Director’s Cut” maps inspired by old arcade games from the 80s and modern platform games of today. Jump’n Bounce is a 1.00 dollar old-school platform game with modern-day gameplay featuring a bouncing emoticon with hardcore abilities.
